website_summaries.verdict: For the classic Doc Marten style, this is the right choice.
pros: These leather boots have an iconic look and feel great
The leather uppers come in a variety of colors, and the synthetic sole provides good grip
The shaft measures 6.5 inches from the arch, and the heel is 1.25 inches tall
cons: May take some time to break in

customer_reviews.title: These are not Real Dr.Marten Boots They Are Fakes / Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: These boots are not real Dr. Martens They are some sort of vinyl, they are not tagged properly inside, the size is off, the soles are some sort of cheap plastic On the bottom it should say Dr. Martens on the sole. These say Matamata Fashion. The Tongue should say the size but the tongue is blank and happens to be the only leather in the shoe it seems. The stitching is also inconsistent, And they are not even oiled leather. They are a shiny man made material
customer_reviews.author: John Russo

customer_reviews.title: Shoe fraud
customer_reviews.text: I've been a victim of shoe fraud! I've purchased doc's before and these shoes were fishy to me. Returning them because they are tight and the leather is stiff and uncomfortable. Things that made me question the authenticity: Sole groves aren't as deep as my other pair Sizing info is all on a rubbery type of material that will definitely wear off (my other pair has that printed directly on the leather) Insoles are exposed cardboard material and the embossing on it seems odd Seller name: Blu Sky
customer_reviews.author: Dog_Mom

customer_reviews.title: Beware of fake shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Beware, I don’t believe these shoes are real Dr. martens. I have about 3 pairs of their shoes. The insoles of these shoes are cardboard. These seem real on the outside but the insoles are not comfortable and half of it is cardboard. No real Dr. martens shoes would have card board as the insoles and very uncomfortable. Not only that but the insoles are not removable as all shoes of this brand are.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: First impressions
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! I love doc martens and these were a great price and seem to be original. After reading some of the comments I was skeptical about purchasing them but I don't regret it. They fit as expected and look great, the boots even came with the yellow laces and original box. I haven't worn them out yet but i'm sure the boots will hold up well. I do own other pairs of Dr.Martens but this would be the first time I buy them from amazon and I am very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Punk Rock 101
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and look great! These boots kind of go with anything. The leather is on the thinner side so these are not to be outdoor work boots. The first 2 weeks I would not recommend wearing them every day instead alternate either half the day or wear every other day until broken in unless you want blisters on your heels. Once broken in they are as comfortable as any shoe I’ve owned. I also recommend getting the shoe polish and treating them like you would other leather boots to avoid cracking. I’m about 3 weeks in and the comfort level has continued to increase.
customer_reviews.author: Beejus Christ

customer_reviews.title: For quality, buy from the "Vintage" series
customer_reviews.text: I agree with most of the reviews describing this particular style as "cheap" and poorly constructed. Once I received the item I instantly returned them for that very reason. Now, I ordered the Dr. Martens from the "Vintage" series that are hand-crafted in England and was amazed at the quality of the product. The England made Docs are the shoes that all of the negative reviews need to purchase! They will be more expensive, but that extra cost will buy the quality people expect from classic Dr. Martens.
customer_reviews.author: Ilovedorkychicks

customer_reviews.title: Great, but had to shrink them to fit
customer_reviews.text: Loved these boots when I was younger, so I got another pair. The length was perfect but the heel, ankle, and instep areas were enormous! It was loose, and a terrible fit. I had to wear extra thick socks and eventually fabric around the heel so that it would not slip. I ended up doing the bathtub shrink by soaking them with water and letting them dry by a small space heater overnight (left the toe area dry). They shrunk so perfect! I oiled and conditioned them after, and I couldn't be happier with the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: +800 Grunge Points
customer_reviews.text: 8 parts fantastic, 2 parts overdramatically squeaky. Love my new boots, though, as many new shoes do, they are a shot for shot remake of that Squeaky Boots episode of Spongebob. I am pretty sure they are getting quieter the more i wear them in though. Pro Tip: put your headphones in, turn up your music, and the sqeak becomes veryone else's problem, not yours. I wear between a 9 and 10 depending on the shoes, bought size 9 since they run large - perfect fit with my added insoles. Great Docs at a lower price - 11 out of 10 of my personalities would buy again ✌
customer_reviews.author: Morgan H

customer_reviews.title: Fake Docs
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be knockoffs. Unmarked brown box, no yellow laces, no tags, no signature DM paper in the box... definitely not paying brand price for off brand shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Durable like Doc Marten's should be
customer_reviews.text: Let it be known that these boots let me live through the East Coast bomb cyclonogenesis event of January 2018, or whatever that insane storm was. It's very hard to put on and take off, which is my only reservation, but are very comfortable once you get them on your feet. The leather softens somewhat with. EDIT: I applied the balsam a second time after an cold snap in Chicago with some intense snow and now it's SO SOFT and much easier to put on. I love these boots. <3
customer_reviews.author: Yanping Nora Soong

customer_reviews.title: 1460's at an incredible price
customer_reviews.text: I would have given these five stars but..... A: one boot had been worn, the other had never been tried on. It looked odd as it took time for the other boot to catch up to the break in time of the other. Had I not needed them for an event that evening, I possibly would have returned. Also my extra pair of laces were not included. Not sure if that is still a thing or not since I haven't bought a pair in 20 years, but it was always important to me to have those.
customer_reviews.author: Rob in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!  Buy them!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had these boots for 2 years now, and when I put them on this morning I thought I'd write a review. These boots took awhile to break in, but they were worth it. They are great for standing and walking around, and wonderful when going out to shovel snow. I wear them in the winter knowing they will have the grip I need to walk around on the ice. They are comfy and everything I was looking for in a big black boot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality stitching
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 16 year old son. He wears a size 9 shoes which is what we purchased. The fit but he did say he may need to wear a thicker sock. He tried them with a hiking sock and it felt much better. This was our first pair today of docs so not able to compare to older pairs but stitching was clean and no loose threads. He was really thrilled about how they looked and said “these are bad ass dad”
customer_reviews.author: Michael Medina

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing them nonstop for several weeks, and I L O V E these shoes. At 16, all I wanted was to wear ripped skinny jeans and Doc Martens, and now I can finally live half of that dream as a respectable, professional adult.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hauer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the size is correct
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how I screwed this up but I checked the size on an old pair of Doc's that I have had for 10+ years. I ordered the same size as what was shown on the show and when I put them on it's about a half size too big. Luckily, it's not an issue where I look like a clown or I am tripping all over the place. Great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: they are comfortable but I can feel the excess space so if ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a woman I wear a 9 1/2 - 10, I think I got a 9 in men's, they are comfortable but I can feel the excess space so if I buy another pair I'll go down a size. The quality of the boot is really impeccable with them only being 70 something dollars. The leather is VERY tough, I assume that's normal. It's my first real boot lol so I'm adjusting. They are just as advertised and I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Meep Meep

customer_reviews.title: had to send back - the correct size was way too big
customer_reviews.text: Oddly, I ordered the correct size -the same size I had tried on in the store and when it showed up it was way too big. The label showed the right size but the fit was way different than the one in the store. The shoes appeared to be originals and were in great condition and I would have loved to have kept them as they seemed like great shoes, but the sizing issue was odd. I sent them back and ended up ordering from another online store that had a bunch of discounts (saved a ton that way also...). Very odd.....
customer_reviews.author: Newportmom

customer_reviews.title: Not True to sSze
customer_reviews.text: I love this classic style of Doc Martens. I have been wearing them for many years. I always bought my size and they fit perfectly. Doc Martens were a reliable buy. But, I guess, times have changed for Doc Martens too. The pricing on these was great but they are larger than they should fit and will need thick socks. A bit disappointed. Suggest you consider buying a size smaller.. Would have given only 3 stars due to sizing issue but the price was so good compared to the $150 these boots usually cost that I gave them 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Matilda

customer_reviews.title: Breaking them in is a b*tc#
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very hard to break in. I wore them for two months straight and they still aren't broken in. The blisters on my feet got so bad that I've stopped wearing them altogether, and the cuts on my Achilles' tendons are still scarred and tender. If you can power through breaking them in, they're gorgeous boots. The tread isn't as meaty as I had hoped, but when they're polished and tied up they look sexy. It's also fun to wear them loose and floppy though.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Be patient with breaking them in
customer_reviews.text: The leather fights back, but worth the few days of pain. After that, I think that they are more comfortable than any running shoe (to wear casually). I have wanted these for 25 years, and could not afford them until now. I feel I can re-live my 90's stone temple pilot and soundgarden grungy life on one end, feel that they are rugged enough to hike with, and after a shoeshine, I can wear with a nice shirt and jeans. Again......be patient with breaking them in.....its worth it in about a week.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan j flood

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: It was as described. We all know Docs run a bit large and that the originals need to be broken in. I wear a size 8 in women’s and these fit just right, they just need to be broken in. I’ve already gotten a few compliments. They only come with black laces, they did not include the yellow laces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. I’ve been wearing Doc Martens for 25+ years and these are just as good as they’ve always been. Great for outdoor activities (dry feet no matter how hard it rains) and they go well with many types of dress. I wear them to casual office days and when tromping through fields on weekends.
customer_reviews.author: Micah H Emmons

customer_reviews.title: BEST BOOTS
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son in Germany, I used Amazon Prime Global and he received them within 8 days. He's very happy. He wears a size 11-11.5 normally. I got him size 11. Fit perfectly even with heavy socks for Berlin snow. These boots last FOREVER!! My husband's been wearing Martens pull on boots for 15 years to work everyday, he rotates three pairs. Good arch support, great leather, heavy duty sole. No complaints at all. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RLC @RGV

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality "leather". After only 7 months, the paper thin top layer is peeling off. I bought these to replace my 27 year old pair which would still be wearable if I could just find someone to reattach the upper to the sole. These new boots are garbage in comparison to the originals.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: They look nice. But, they did not fit like his other docs that we purchased directly from Doc Martins website. Does that mean they weren't real? They seemed harder than his other docs as well. So, we returned them and Amazon makes that easy to do so that's good.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy S Morris

customer_reviews.title: but my feet were fine. Give them a go
customer_reviews.text: Pulled them right out of the box and onto my feet and headed out shopping. Two hours later, they were still stiff, but my feet were fine. Give them a go, a bit at a time to break them in and you will be satisfied with the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Barrington-King

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!!!  would give negative stars..
customer_reviews.text: This thing, these things, are not even remotely similar to real docs (dr. martens).. the flippy floppy fleather garbage they are sewn from would be better used for filling holes in the ground, deep in the ground; but that would be bad for said ground, and the earth around it. These things are pure chop-shop, hack garbage!
customer_reviews.author: e-1

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed  :(
customer_reviews.text: I should have returned these boots. They are extremely uncomfortable due to a small flap if leather where the tongue is sewn to the rest of the shoe that rolls up and creates a pressure point on the top of my foot. I have tried everything I can think of the prevent this from happening. Otherwise, these are nice looking boots. It's infuriating that I can't wear them!
customer_reviews.author: DZA

customer_reviews.title: CLASSIC, Buuuuut...
customer_reviews.text: I love the classic docs, If you want a plain black or brown boot this is the only way to go, even their steel toes are nicer looking than your average. BUT READ THIS! These (the brown pair I ordered) didn't come with alternate color laces (plain brown), a polish (or waxing) kit, OR stickers lol... Could care less about the 90's-esque stickers but I did used to like that they came with brown laces (as the yellow ones are really dated), and a shoe shine kit to keep 'em nice... Just saying, if you want plain thick brown laces, and a shoe shine kit plan on spending an extra 50 or so...
customer_reviews.author: John Hiebs

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of Docs! Exact color as the pic and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second attempt to purchase a pair of Cherry Red Doc Marten's. The first pair was black with a little bit of red. These are EXACTLY as the picture shows. I am typically a 10.5 US mens. The 10s are too tight. Be sure to go UP a 1/2 size if you are in between sizes. There is a break-in time period for all great leather shoes/boots. I will expect the same from these. But so far, I am extremely pleased with the quality and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: vtfirefighter32

customer_reviews.title: Dr. Martens - Moms says always wear good shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter (age 23) to pick up her spirits. She has joint laxity in her ankles, but maintains a very active life style (hiking, caving, etc). All that activity in poor quality footwear (her choice, not mine) led to a significant ankle sprain. I bought her these fun, but sturdy Dr. Martens while she was rehabbing her ankle. She loves EVERYTHING about them. And I love that she has the arch and ankle support that she needs.
customer_reviews.author: CalamityJane

customer_reviews.title: Did something change?
customer_reviews.text: I've been a size 11 for almost thirty years and have worn Docs in the past, including boots exactly like this. But this time, they seemed different, like the quality of the leather had gone down a tad. More plasticky. I wore them for several days, thinking they would break in cicely, but they didn't. I double checked the boot for size and they were both 11 regular width but my feet were sliding around in them to the point I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: MagicMike239

customer_reviews.title: OMG!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted black leather lace up boots, and have always liked Doctor Martens look, Well!!! I was looking at these and realized there was an offer of 35$ off, well 34.95$!!! So I jumped on it!! Paid 104$ for them and absolutely love them!! I plan on getting some of the leather protector from Dr. Martens, will help soften them up and break them in a little more, they really don’t need much breaking in, but I like mine more worn in
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingQueen

customer_reviews.title: Sizes vary wildly
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these boots seems very good. Good leather, sturdy soles. I am normally an 11 in US sizes. Some brands I am more of a 10 1/2. I ordered these in 11 US and they were huge! Far too big to try and keep knowing they would break in and become even more loose. I returned them and ordered a 10 (no half sizes). Now the 10 fits a bit tight. I am keeping them as I feel they will break in and eventually fit well. That is my hope. I ordered the Dr. Martens conditioning balm as well. Maybe that will help in stretching them out.
customer_reviews.author: TMH

customer_reviews.title: These are the originals.
customer_reviews.text: The most confusing thing is the sizing. I wish they would just list Euro sizing. Seems like what I thought I ordered was never what showed up but it’s because they aren’t clear enough about the women’s and men’s sizes. Greasy is like a dull finish that naturally repels water pretty well without any additional maintenance
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Piss poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a pair of these since is was 16yrs old. Just received my first pair... Right out the box, missing an eyelet and right boot smaller than left boot. I was warned that Dr. Marten’s quality has degraded since the 90’s. Now I’m warning you. RETURNING! Next stop: Solovair.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: The Dr. Martin Boots
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were exquisite!!! I loved them!! Such great quality!! I want a pair in my size an American 10. The ones I received were an American 9 and too small for me unfortunately! I would have loved to have kept them but they would have hurt to try to wear. Thank you, Julie Wittman If you get a size 10 in navy or black I would be interested. Thank you again.
customer_reviews.author: Julie W.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!!!
customer_reviews.text: First, I did order the Dr. Martens comfort insole to put in them and the Dubbin and Wonder Basalm to treat and protect the leather and help them break in faster. All of these things helped them break in SO FAST and they’re SO COMFORTABLE!!! Favorite boots I’ve ever had and they look so good! I wear hiking socks with them that are moisture wicking and keep feet cool/warm. All of this combined...I’ve had no issues with blisters! They’re literally perfect!
customer_reviews.author: LRo3

customer_reviews.title: Not true quality Dr. Martens
customer_reviews.text: These boots do not compare with the old style Dr. Martens that were made in England. The quality is clearly lacking. I read some of the reviews prior to purchasing these boots, and the opinions/results were mixed. I took a chance and ordered a pair and was disappointed in what arrived. I never even tried the boots on because it was abundantly clear that they were not the same quality as the classic styles produced in England. It's a shame. I truly loved the pair I had years ago, and completely wore through the soles without a single complaint. I will not be purchasing any more Dr. Martens brand shoes/boots until I can find some that are made in England.
customer_reviews.author: D. G. Parker

customer_reviews.title: They are just OK.
customer_reviews.text: These were not the same as my previous ones. They are a little bigger than the ones I bought that were made in England.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: If your a 9-9.5 US order a 10 UK
customer_reviews.text: I am used to wearing the 1491 three eye shoes and I wanted some boot so I ordered these 1460s and I think they are a bit clunky. If you like the toe area a little thicker and taller then you'll probably like these boots, but I was looking for something a bit less bulky. I would give this a 5 star in service and quality, but I didn't like the boots. Amazon has a great return policy so if you are interested buy them and if you don't like them return them.
customer_reviews.author: Gael

customer_reviews.title: Almost there...
customer_reviews.text: Ok have always loved Docs. And, in my mind they used to fit differently. There doesnt appear to be any arch support. I have a high instep, and as a result I apparently use up more shoe lace. Once I replace these with longer laces, I'm sure I'll be happier with these, formerly my favorite shoes.
customer_reviews.author: DrVonHeils

customer_reviews.title: Love my boots
customer_reviews.text: Love my boots. I ordered a 14 (my normal size) and they are just a tad bit large (but fit perfectly with thick wool socks for Michigan winters). Keep that in mind. I do a lot of walking at work, and my legs aren't dragging at the end of the day like they used to with some heavier boots. I use Mink Oil weekly to keep them protected, and other than expected wear from daily use they look and feel great. 6 months in, no stitching coming loose, soles look great, developing attractive "worn-in" look too. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jordon O.

customer_reviews.title: Questionable authenticity
customer_reviews.text: I have three pairs of Doc Martens I purchased from the store and they give me no problems than leather looks great unlike these that look like and feels like plastic. They left me with two open cuts on the back of my ankles I don't know maybe this is a different brand or series or something but these just don't look or feel authentic or real leather I'm returning them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Chinese counterfeits! Docs don’t come in half sizes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in size 10.5 US Men’s. I should have known better; Dr. Martens are not made in half sizes. The shoes that arrived were poorly made Chinese counterfeits. They were not even made of leather; some cheap man made rubbery material instead! The base of one shoe was buckled, terrible construction, the font on the Dr Marten heel tag was wrong for the brand, the tread on the sole was all wrong; these weren’t even a decent counterfeit, they were obviously fake. The shoe looked like it would fall apart with mere hours of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Decent, not great
customer_reviews.text: Decent boots. They broke in quickly and they are pretty comfortable. They run big tho and I literally pull the laces all the way tight and they still aren’t tight around my leg (and no I’m not super skinny). My main complaint is that the soles wore out in 7 months... even for everyday wear, this is much too fast for “quality” boots. My vans soles last longer than these.
customer_reviews.author: Billy C.

customer_reviews.title: I'm dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Too coarse thick seam connecting the tongue with the boot. Just crashes into a leg, uncomfortable and painful. 117.15 dollars to the wind, alas. I did not have the opportunity to return the shoes, because I live in Ukraine. This is the worst Dr Martens pair I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Inga Summer

customer_reviews.title: fantastic Dr. Martens!
customer_reviews.text: Top notch quality from Dr. Martens. Love this color and the black lacing goes well with the dark cherry red. I have a pair of black Demonia defiant 100's and needed a contrasting color. I prefer deep crimson (blood red) or black so these did the trick This takes me back to my high school days when all us goths wore the coolest and most unique looking boots. Well it's definitely not a phase. Still dress this way to this day and I'm 33 now. Thank you so much for having this color and style at a great price. Everything fit well and arrived undamaged and new. Awesome stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Aloi Kui

customer_reviews.title: Fake Martens
customer_reviews.text: I believe these are FAKE! Not as pictured, the bottom is different and the quality is off.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Owens

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I needed these for my trip to Africa and they worked fantastic! They took a little while to break in, (3 weeks active) note; wear long socks when breaking in. (Prevents cuts and bruises) When they're finally broken in, your feet are in paradise. I walked over mounds of dirt, rocks, water, almost anything you can think of and they continued to run through every obstacle i put them in. Definitely buying another pair, though these things will last me a lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Smith

customer_reviews.title: New Docs just aren't the same
customer_reviews.text: The color was a lot darker than I expected but were still nice. I was replacing my old pair which were finally falling apart after 7+ years. I've seen a lot of reviews saying how quickly they fall apart now so I was already cautious. The right boot fit so much tighter than the left it was almost like one boot was a narrow. My old boots were some of the most comfortable and reliable boots I've ever had so this was all a major disappointment. Looks like it's time to make the jump to red wings.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Loblaw

customer_reviews.title: Same as it ever was...
customer_reviews.text: I've seen some critical reviews on here re: quality, so I felt compelled to write a review. I've been wearing Docs since 1986 and just received my new 1460s in Aztec Crazyhorse Leather. I've seen the knock off synthetic leather Docs before and they're garbage, but these are the real deal. No complaints at all and they fit perfect. Pretty stoked.
customer_reviews.author: Robby B

customer_reviews.title: skinhead skinhead....
customer_reviews.text: These new asian-made docs are amazingly good compared to the brilliance of the originals. They are defintley not of the same quality in many areas, the most noticeably in the thickness and toughness of the leather, but who am I to judge, they didn't even take that long to break-in like the old ones did, and they still look awesome. I would actually challenge anyone on the entire internet to find an other heritage-type product gone overseas that is as close to the original as these new asian doc martens are. They're pretty alright, and for 1/3 the price. I'm positive they won't last 5 years like the old ones, but I'm still pretty happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: evan parker

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and awesome boots.
customer_reviews.text: These boots last forever. My last pair lasted ~10 years before finally needing to be replaced. They never come in half sizes so they either are a little too big or a little too small. I go with a little too small, and while the break-in period really hammers my feet, after a few weeks they fit like a glove and are perfect. For the past 20 years this is the only boot I buy.
customer_reviews.author: WH

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I got these initially as weekend wear, but I just switched from working an office job to a relaxed job making soaps and standing all day 2 days ago though I got the shoes a few weeks ago. The floors get slippery due to all of the oil that I use, and I can say these shoes were so convenient to have for the job transition! I get body butter and oils all over my shoes and it’s okay! They’re hard to break in (I’m still in the process of doing it), but I’ve gotten compliments! I don’t know what I’m going to do when it gets hot outside again because these are a godsend for this job!
customer_reviews.author: kari moody

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. L
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my husband. Came nicely packaged with no issues. My husband wouldn’t spend the money because he’s a tight wad so I made sure I splurged a little and got him what he wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Cat S.

customer_reviews.title: Caution on who you buy from
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pairs, 1 from Amazon which are what they say they are and 1 pair from Zap&*%s which decidedly are not. Proper ones are brilliant, the others like hard plastic, no air sole, wrong stitching, no tag and no box. Very, very disappointed, your mileage, as always, will vary, good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Analyzerman

customer_reviews.title: size 7 women us
customer_reviews.text: i have two, black and ox red. ordered green. were larger than a usually 37. toe was boxier. side by side comparison something was just really off with the look and feel of boot. disapointed and returned. too off to keep.
customer_reviews.author: TheF’nLizardKing

customer_reviews.title: Good price solid quality minor issues
customer_reviews.text: Good quality boots. The pair I received had some minor marks and scuffs. Looks like they are from the manufacture process. Also I purchased the crazy horse leather they may be designed to have a minor wear look to the out of the box. Love the fit and comfort. I stand for 12 hours or more a day on work days. They support me wonderfully and look good too.
customer_reviews.author: Photog, All things geek, and traveler

customer_reviews.title: Cute but too big
customer_reviews.text: The boots were a bit larger than expected. I usually wear a 7 but these were huge on me. I tried a 6 on in stores since it was recommended to size down but the 6 was too tight on me. They didn't have 7 in store so I bought 7 online but upon trying them on, they were a bit too big.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: So happy with these boots
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy doc martens based on some reviews that states they were not true to size, and that the boots required a break in period. My experience thus far has been great. The seller I purchased from shipped the boots the very next day and they arrived in perfect new condition. I laced them up and they were a perfect fit really true to size. I wore them for a whole day and they were very comfortable in their new condition. I didn't experience any break in period discomfort. I highly recommend these boots. I am very satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 Star
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for my brother he is very happy. I gave 4 star because honestly I am not really happy with the texture of the outside skin, but I know its an original leather though. For the fit, He said it just fit good but not too comfortable and I think just because it still new. Overall he is very happy with it and I think its worth with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Best Boots Ever!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES these boots and has worn them everyday since he's received them. There was a short "breaking in" period but since then has claimed they are the most comfortable pair of boots he's ever owned. They look great too. Classic, yet very cool. Black Greasy is a great color choice... after several weeks of non-stop wear, they still look brand new. Sellers were excellent to deal with and boots arrived even sooner than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Need longer legs
customer_reviews.text: Love Docs, and my hiking boots are falling apart. I thought I'd try something different, but these don't work for me. My legs are too short and calves too thick. These run too much on top and can't get tight enough for ankle support. I returned them and will go back to the 6-hold hiking boot.
customer_reviews.author: a reader from Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: the white Doc martins boot is great. the leather is a bit stiff, but I am sure it will loosen as I wear the boot. I got a size 9 us/ 42 ur. it is true to size. looks good and so far so good with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is vague. Not sure if they are using US or UK in the selection box
customer_reviews.text: I take a size 10 in US Women’s and I ordered that size in the classic black DM. The sizing listing is incorrect. The selection given was 10 Women’s / 9 Men but they definitely a full size too big so I exchanged them for a size down. Hopefully the new ones will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Second pair!
customer_reviews.text: I own these boots in my size. My son wanted a pair for his birthday. Doc Marten's are well-made, quality boots. I've had mine for over a year and they still look brand new. They are sturdy, yet comfortable. We wouldn't want another brand!
customer_reviews.author: DocJr

customer_reviews.title: Splitting soles after very light use
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in Dec 2014. 2 years later, after VERY LIGHT use, soles are splitting. I owned many Dr Martens boots in my lifetime, and this NEVER happened so far. All my previously owned Martens boots survived many years of abuse. What happened to this pair is extremely disappointing, and devastating to the brand that I loved for 30 years. Not sure now if these boots here on Amazon are fake or real.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome docs
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend for his birthday after he'd been eyeing my pair of docs. They were a little loose since Dr. Marten's doesn't have half sizes, but they fit perfectly with insoles. Also, this leather is softer and more broken in than my pair which is great for him. The quality is what I would expect from Dr. Marten's as well. I did get him a different pair of laces as he felt that they looked too much like work boots with the yellow laces. Anyways, great boots for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Tadge

customer_reviews.title: Dr. Marten Fan
customer_reviews.text: So sadly had to return. I usually wear a women's size 7 - in Dr. Martens sized for women a 6 is usually a good fit. These probably would not have fit my feet in width and size .... no matter... too tight size 6 too large size 7. I have happily purchased several pairs of Dr. Martens before. Take note of the type of leather. It makes a big difference. This is a good price for the product if you are able to obtain free shipping and free returns. Amazon Prime ensures ease of return or exchange.
customer_reviews.author: 4kids

customer_reviews.title: Best all around boots in the world
customer_reviews.text: There’s not a lot to say they are Doc’s so you already know your getting what you pay for. Super comfortable, and incredibly well made. I have Doc boots and shoes that are 15 and 20 years old that are still great.
customer_reviews.author: The Saxon

customer_reviews.title: Lasted just shy of a year
customer_reviews.text: These boots lasted me just two months shy of a year before I found a tear along the side of it from wear. They survived 8+ hour days and left me not in terrible pain like literally every other shoe I tried for work would do. I will not be purchasing these again just because I'd to doubt something new, but I will be purchasing within the doc marten brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of boots
customer_reviews.text: Great looking boots, feel sturdily made and came in authentic packaging. Theses seemed to be made in Thailand according to inserts. The break in period was hard like any pair of Docs, but ine foot felt too tight and uncomfortable even after they reached broke in status. Around the top of the left foot on stepping there was a tightness, almost pinching sensation where the boot is supposed to bend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris V

customer_reviews.title: Real Docs For A Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my husband and having owned 4 pairs of docs already, I know these are legit. I ordered the black greasy color. I wish they had these in my size. These are the real deal. I only bought these because they're directly from Amazon. My husband is a size 8 in mens sizes and these fit as expected. The leather is softer than the shiny leather docs which makes them easier to break in. Update: I bought myself a pair in the cherry red rouge color and they’re real docs! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item was exactly as describe
customer_reviews.text: My son really like these. The only thing is was my sons major gift for Christmas and they did not arrive until December 28th. They were supposed to arrive on December 21st. Luckily my son is 21 years old and is old enough to understand. However someone else may. They boots themselves are awesome and that’s what was important so thank you in the end everyone is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Love my boots!
customer_reviews.text: They have a minor defect in stitching otherwise I would've given them 5 stars. I feel like i already broke them in and surprisingly they ended up a little loose. It gets uncomfortable after a few hours. I have original England made Docs and I'm still hoping that with more use they'll mold to my feet the way those have. Still too stiff buy they are getting more flexible. As for the look, they are perfect. I use them with EVERYTHING.
customer_reviews.author: Castaneda 84

customer_reviews.title: Sexy boot
customer_reviews.text: Pheeeewie doctors delivers! Durable ass kickers but I take care of them they’re kinda one of my dress up shoes so I clean, wax and polish them to a fresh shine after each wear. I take pride in my boots. They’re not cheap. Theyre admirable, classic, dependable, stylish and rather sexy, but not with mud all over them. Keep em clean and polished. They’ll thank you for it.
customer_reviews.author: Brendanfg21

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These boots were my third pair of Docs in recent years and are by far my favorite. The color is perfect to pair with jeans and the muted flowers add a feminine detail without being obnoxiously evident. Like all Docs, they take a few wearings to soften up and reach their maximum comfort level; so give them time! My only complaint was that I found the laces too short and fat to tie tightly. I ended up buying a longer pair so I could double knot them. As sandal season approaches, I'm a little sad to put these puppies away until fall!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Grimley

customer_reviews.title: Need comfortable boots?  Look no further.
customer_reviews.text: These boots offer the sturdy support you expect from a full leather boot... but they're SUPER comfortable and ready for work, play or just lookin' g o. o. d. You may not even be trying... but they will start and end conversations for you. They can tell people ... "Hey! Let's Go! No Fear!"... "Vamos Sin Miedo" ... or just "X*#! off"
customer_reviews.author: Trusted Purchase

customer_reviews.title: Love my Docs
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Plenty of room if I want to wewr thicker socks. The left boot isn't as comfortable as the right but that could be my feet. Need to work on the tongue a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Karina C. Kness-kuhl

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of boots.
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. They fit great ( with the addition of dr. Martens insoles) The leather is soft and moves with you. There is a short break in period but once you get past that, nothing but comfort that looks too good.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Grace

customer_reviews.title: The fit is good only strange issue is that to get it tight ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 11 or 12 depending on the brand. Bought a UK size 10. The fit is good only strange issue is that to get it tight the eyelets almost touch. looks funny but it is hidden by your pants anyway. If I went a size smaller my toes would not fit and my legs are not skinny.
customer_reviews.author: Jon L

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THESE BOOTS
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! Love the style. I ordered a size 7, I am a women’s 9US. They fit perfect. Very happy with my purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: jet

customer_reviews.title: Size at least a number too small
customer_reviews.text: I had previously bought a pair of boots from the same maker (supposedly) and they fit just fine. I ordered these using the exact same specifications but the boots were narrower and actually smaller. They would not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Antonio Arce Arenales

customer_reviews.title: not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: these are not the boots pictured. There is no bumptoe, and there is no shape or contour in the ankle. Its not fitted at all. Its like wearing a refrigerator on each food. When I asked what the deal was... no reply.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I never bother to write reviews but these boots are junk. I bought them in May and as of November they’re in the garbage. The whole bottom of the right boot separated. Dr. Martens used to be indestructible now there just made in China garbage.
customer_reviews.author: J Runz

customer_reviews.title: Consider your size carefully!
customer_reviews.text: As always make sure you're buying from a legitimate seller, but I received exactly what I ordered. I love these; first day I wore them I got 3 compliments on them! The boots do fit really tight, even after purchasing with measuring my foot, so if you have a wider foot, I'd say size up. They are breaking in wonderfully after a couple weeks and are starting to feel better and better every day.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip McClellan

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for the money
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these boots for 5-6 weeks. They are comfy, offer good support and have that great shock absorbing sole. Great price for the quality boot this is. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Size down and break them in for a super comfortable everyday boot
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair of Docs and I'm sooo happy with them, they have become my eveyday shoe--the height of the boot and them being completely black make it so they go with just about everything. Boots were very stiff when they arrived, as expected--conditionedt the leather right away and sat them in front of the heater overnight then wore for a couple weeks with thick socks, now they're super comfortable. I wear a size US Womens 8 in boots and sized down to US7 in these, they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classic Doc’s - Just freaking awesome!
customer_reviews.text: 1460 8-hole Doc’s, exactly what you would expect and just as awesome as they always are. 3rd pair since 1988. Expecting them to last and perform just as well as the last two pair.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Classics, I'd Recommend 'Em.
customer_reviews.text: Still a well made product, classic boot, four stars because frankly there's better boots out there A.K.A. red wings and certain wolverine models that are made in America, (little bit better looking, and hold together longer) but these are still a solid buy and a staple for the men's wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: John Hiebs

customer_reviews.title: I believe they sent me men boots instead of women
customer_reviews.text: I wear 11 they feel too big I wore them they kept slipping off my feet I lost the receipt I'm going to call customer service to see if they can do something I'm really disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They have a strange fit. I like them anyway.
customer_reviews.text: I like them but they are not as sturdy/heavy duty as they once were. That said, they are fine for urban uses. I had to modify the fit though because they were too large. I like my shoes/boots to fit snug and even pulling the laces all the way tight, I didn't have the fit I wanted on the top of my foot.I ended up gluing the old insole to the inside of the tongue and putting in a aftermarket insole to create a tolerable fit...
customer_reviews.author: M. Fields

customer_reviews.title: Color was off. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews stating that these boots were low quality. I purchased anyway in the hope that it was just one offs. When they arrived the color did not match the picture. I purchased the cocoa, a redish brown. However, when they arrived they were almost black. Maybe they just need to update their pictures, but I returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leather is thinner than expected but seem to be a decent boot.
customer_reviews.text: They fit fine in the middle of my foot and are a little loose in the ankle and near the toes. The leather is surprisingly thin, like 60's-era combat boots, but so far they're holding up well. The only thing that bother me is the top of the boot is too wide, as in when laced up teach side meets before it's touching my leg.
customer_reviews.author: Doug W

customer_reviews.title: horrible
customer_reviews.text: i had to send them back i ordered a five in men’s and received a 14 in men’s. the size difference was so ridiculous i didn’t even order more. the material was too hard too stiff definitely not original doc quality
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Britt

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what people are talking about that Docs ate different now. I had numerous pairs back in 80/90's and I think these are the same of not more comfortable. I was concerned they aren't made in England any longer, but their fine. Trust me. Super comfy and easy to break in. Great Amaozon price too.
customer_reviews.author: Notre Dame 1996

customer_reviews.title: I love these so much I bought them awhile ago now ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much I bought them awhile ago now and they were true to size just like I had hoped they would be. I think the only thing I noticed is they are very hard to break in. I wear them almost everyday and the backs of the shoe from my ankle to my heel is always sore after wearing them(while walking accessivly). I walk ALOT so I thought it was strange that they still aren't broken in completely yet. Otherwise these are perfect and durable I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Good boots, bad shoelaces
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the boots for about a month. They’ve broken in nicely but the shoelaces have already broken on both boots. These are high quality boots that deserve a much higher quality shoelace.
customer_reviews.author: ARob

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: It is true that Docs aren't made the way they used to, but I will say the break-in period is much easier than it used to be. 20 years ago I would have to cover my feet in band-aids and suffer through blisters for the first month until they got to a comfortable place. These new ones came out of the box and were on my feet all day without a single issue....I can't complain about that! They also seem to run more true to size now. Before I would have to buy a size (or at least a half-size) down but I'm glad I went with my true size on these, they fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: That Girl

product_meta.title: Dr. Martens, 1460 Original 8-Eye Leather Boot for Men and Women
product_meta.description: The 1460 is the original Dr. Martens Boot. Made with instantly recognizable features: 8 eyes, classic Dr. Martens leather, grooved sides, a heel-loop, yellow stitching and a comfortable, air-cushioned sole. Built to last, this unisex boot is forged using one of the finest methods of construction: utilizing a Goodyear welt and heat-sealing it to the sole. The 1460 is made with highly durable leather and sits on an AirWair sole, which is oil and fat resistant with good abrasion and slip resistance. Use Dr. Martens Wonder Balsam to protect the leather and keep your boots clean, soft and supple.
feature_bullets: THE ORIGINAL: Instantly recognizable and ready to make your own; With 8 eyes, grooved sides and yellow stitching, the 1460 has style for the ages
AIR-CUSHIONED: Dr. Martens famous “bouncing” AirWair soles are comfortable, oil and fat resistant and provide good abrasion and slip resistance
MADE LIKE NO OTHER: Boots built to pound the pavement; The leather upper and sole are heat-sealed together for exceptional durability
AUTHENTIC AS YOU: Made with classic leather that only gets better with time; Use Dr. Martens Wonder Balsam to protect the leather and keep your boots clean, soft and supple
KICK THE NORM: From utilitarian work boot to cultural icon, Dr. Martens became a symbol of self-expression; Stand up, stand out and wear them well
